---
title: "Prevendo o meu peso usando Forecast"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r importingData}

library(googlesheets)
library(tidyverse)

gs_key("1P1q58DYs4Jy5cXKXCrdl11ru4Rop1Mu7r8fXEraCX9M") %>%
  gs_read_csv(ws=1) %>%
  select(1:2) %>%
  mutate(Peso=Peso/10) %>%
  set_names(c("date","weight")) -> measures

head(measures)

```

```{r fillingNA}
library(tsibble)

measures %>%
  as_tsibble() %>%
  fill_na() -> measures

head(measures,20)

```

```{r completing_data}

library(mice)

measures %>%
  mice(method = "pmm") %>%
  mice::complete("long") -> measures_c

head(measures_c,20)

```
